_comment: getRelationships -- Pattern B: bulk fleet lookup (Tier B, pass list of aircraftids)
notes: send hundreds of aircraftids in aclist for one-call bulk ownership lookup
aircraftcount = number of distinct aircraft matched in the response
count = total relationship records (Owner + Operator + Chief Pilot per aircraft)
same response structure as Pattern A -- nested company sub-objects, relationtype field
to get primary owner per aircraft: filter on relationtype=='Owner' and relationseqno==1
python_snippet: owners = {r['aircraftid']: r for r in data['relationships'] if r['relationtype'] == 'Owner' and r['relationseqno'] == 1}
